name: subtract
description: Subtracts from a value and a cost. May be a negative cost

name: remove
description: Remove a value from the sheet. Can have no cost, so all cost must be removed

name: define
description: Define a value on this sheet. Must be done to guarantee a trait exists. Has no cost, so any cost must be added next

name: comment
description: Semantically equivalent to a set with 0, 0, and a note

name: add
description: Adds to a value and a cost

name: set
description: Sets an existing value to something and dictates the cost.
